questions.label: JWT Secret
questions.name: JWT_SECRET
questions.description: Secret used to sign JWT tokens. Must be a strong secret.

questions.label: Anon Key
questions.name: ANON_KEY
questions.description: The public anonymous key for client-side API access.

questions.label: Service Role Key
questions.name: SERVICE_ROLE_KEY
questions.description: The private service role key. Bypasses RLS. Keep secret.

questions.label: Secret Key Base
questions.name: SECRET_KEY_BASE
questions.description: Secret for encryption of Realtime secrets.

questions.label: Vault Encryption Key
questions.name: VAULT_ENC_KEY
questions.description: Key used for Vault data encryption.

questions.label: PG Meta Crypto Key
questions.name: PG_META_CRYPTO_KEY
questions.description: Key used to encrypt credentials in pg-meta.

questions.label: PostgreSQL Password
questions.name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
questions.description: Password for the Postgres database user.

questions.label: Supabase Public URL
questions.name: SUPABASE_PUBLIC_URL
questions.description: The public URL where Supabase services are accessible.

questions.label: API External URL
questions.name: API_EXTERNAL_URL
questions.description: The URL used by external services to reach the API.

questions.label: Site URL
questions.name: SITE_URL
questions.description: The URL of your frontend application.

questions.label: Supabase Dashboard User
questions.name: DASHBOARD_USERNAME
questions.description: Username for accessing the Supabase Studio dashboard.

questions.label: Supabase Dashboard Password
questions.name: DASHBOARD_PASSWORD
questions.description: Password for accessing the Supabase Studio dashboard.

questions.label: PostgreSQL Host
questions.name: POSTGRES_HOST
questions.description: Hostname or IP of the PostgreSQL database.

questions.label: PostgreSQL Database Name
questions.name: POSTGRES_DB
questions.description: Name of the PostgreSQL database.

questions.label: PostgreSQL User
questions.name: POSTGRES_USER
questions.description: Username for the internal Postgres database.

questions.label: PostgreSQL Port
questions.name: POSTGRES_PORT
questions.description: Port number for the PostgreSQL database.

questions.label: MinIO Admin User
questions.name: MINIO_ROOT_USER
questions.description: Root username for MinIO storage admin.

questions.label: MinIO Admin Password
questions.name: MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD
questions.description: Root password for MinIO storage admin.

questions.label: Disable Signup
questions.name: DISABLE_SIGNUP
questions.description: Set to true to disable public signups.

questions.label: Enable Email Signup
questions.name: ENABLE_EMAIL_SIGNUP
questions.description: Enable signup via email and password.

questions.label: Enable Email Autoconfirm
questions.name: ENABLE_EMAIL_AUTOCONFIRM
questions.description: Automatically confirm emails without sending a verification link.

questions.label: Enable Phone Signup
questions.name: ENABLE_PHONE_SIGNUP
questions.description: Enable signup via phone number.

questions.label: Enable Phone Autoconfirm
questions.name: ENABLE_PHONE_AUTOCONFIRM
questions.description: Automatically confirm phone numbers.

questions.label: Enable Anonymous Users
questions.name: ENABLE_ANONYMOUS_USERS
questions.description: Allow anonymous temporary users.

questions.label: JWT Expiry
questions.name: JWT_EXPIRY
questions.description: How long access tokens are valid (in seconds).

questions.label: Additional Redirect URLs
questions.name: ADDITIONAL_REDIRECT_URLS
questions.description: Comma-separated list of allowed redirect URLs for Auth.

questions.label: SMTP Host
questions.name: SMTP_HOST
questions.description: Hostname for the SMTP server.

questions.label: SMTP Port
questions.name: SMTP_PORT
questions.description: Port for the SMTP server.

questions.label: SMTP User
questions.name: SMTP_USER
questions.description: Username for SMTP authentication.

questions.label: SMTP Password
questions.name: SMTP_PASS
questions.description: Password for SMTP authentication.

questions.label: SMTP Sender Name
questions.name: SMTP_SENDER_NAME
questions.description: Name to appear in sent emails.

questions.label: SMTP Admin Email
questions.name: SMTP_ADMIN_EMAIL
questions.description: Email address for admin notifications.

questions.label: Logflare Public Token
questions.name: LOGFLARE_PUBLIC_ACCESS_TOKEN
questions.description: Public key for Logflare analytics.

questions.label: Logflare Private Token
questions.name: LOGFLARE_PRIVATE_ACCESS_TOKEN
questions.description: Private key for Logflare analytics.

questions.label: Mailer Path: Invite
questions.name: MAILER_URLPATHS_INVITE
questions.description: URL path for invitation emails.

questions.label: Mailer Path: Confirmation
questions.name: MAILER_URLPATHS_CONFIRMATION
questions.description: URL path for confirmation emails.

questions.label: Mailer Path: Recovery
questions.name: MAILER_URLPATHS_RECOVERY
questions.description: URL path for password recovery emails.

questions.label: Mailer Path: Email Change
questions.name: MAILER_URLPATHS_EMAIL_CHANGE
questions.description: URL path for email change verification.

questions.label: Kong HTTP Port
questions.name: KONG_HTTP_PORT
questions.description: Port for Kong API Gateway (HTTP).

questions.label: Kong HTTPS Port
questions.name: KONG_HTTPS_PORT
questions.description: Port for Kong API Gateway (HTTPS).

questions.label: Docker Socket Path
questions.name: DOCKER_SOCKET_LOCATION
questions.description: Path to the Docker socket on the host.

questions.label: Studio Default Organization
questions.name: STUDIO_DEFAULT_ORGANIZATION
questions.description: Name of the default organization in Studio.

questions.label: Studio Default Project
questions.name: STUDIO_DEFAULT_PROJECT
questions.description: Name of the default project in Studio.

questions.label: OpenAI API Key
questions.name: OPENAI_API_KEY
questions.description: API Key for OpenAI integration.

questions.label: PostgREST Database Schemas
questions.name: PGRST_DB_SCHEMAS
questions.description: Comma-separated list of database schemas to expose.

questions.label: ImgProxy WebP Detection
questions.name: IMGPROXY_ENABLE_WEBP_DETECTION
questions.description: Enable WebP detection for image transformation.

questions.label: Pooler Proxy Port Transaction
questions.name: POOLER_PROXY_PORT_TRANSACTION
questions.description: Port for Supavisor transaction pooler.

questions.label: Pooler Tenant ID
questions.name: POOLER_TENANT_ID
questions.description: Tenant ID for the connection pooler.

questions.label: Pooler Default Pool Size
questions.name: POOLER_DEFAULT_POOL_SIZE
questions.description: Default pool size for the connection pooler.

questions.label: Pooler Max Client Config
questions.name: POOLER_MAX_CLIENT_CONN
questions.description: Maximum client connections for the pooler.

questions.label: Pooler DB Pool Size
questions.name: POOLER_DB_POOL_SIZE
questions.description: Database pool size for the pooler.
